titleStmt.title: The trve coppy of a letter sent from Thomas, Earle of Arundell, Lord Marshall from Middleborough in Zealand to Mr. Pym and read before the committee the 18 of September, 1641 : whereunto is added the coppy of another letter sent to Mr. Pym also from the committee in Scotland, Sep. 13, 1641 : with the names of the committees that sat there for that day.
titleStmt.author: Arundel, Thomas Howard, Earl of, 1585-1646.

titleStmt.title: The trve coppy of a letter sent from Thomas, Earle of Arundell, Lord Marshall from Middleborough in Zealand to Mr. Pym and read before the committee the 18 of September, 1641 : whereunto is added the coppy of another letter sent to Mr. Pym also from the committee in Scotland, Sep. 13, 1641 : with the names of the committees that sat there for that day.
titleStmt.author: Arundel, Thomas Howard, Earl of, 1585-1646.
Stapleton, Philip, Sir, 1603-1647.
Hampden, John, 1594-1643.

notesStmt.note: Thomas Earle of Arundell was appointed to escort Marie de Medicis Queen Dowager of France, to Holland. Cf. BM.
Letter from committee in Scotland signed: Phillip Stapleton. John Hameden.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
